channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows

item.title: CVE-2017-1452|2024-09-16T21:58:11.669Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows 9.7, 10,1, 10.5, and 11.1 (includes DB2 Connect Server) could allow a local user to obtain elevated privilege and overwrite DB2 files. IBM X-Force ID: 128180.

item.title: CVE-2019-4588|2024-09-16T17:33:45.584Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 could allow a local user to execute arbitrary code and conduct DLL hijacking attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-40372|2024-09-16T18:40:19.199Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted SQL statement using External Tables. IBM X-Force ID: 263499.

item.title: CVE-2021-20579|2024-09-16T20:51:50.232Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 could allow a user who can create a view or inline SQL function to obtain sensitive information when AUTO_REVAL is set to DEFFERED_FORCE. IBM X-Force ID: 199283.

item.title: CVE-2019-4015|2024-09-16T22:08:30.506Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, which could allow an authenticated local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system as root. IBM X-ForceID: 155893.

item.title: CVE-2018-1427|2024-09-16T17:43:56.777Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM GSKit (IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1) contains several environment variables that a local attacker could overflow and cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 139072.

item.title: CVE-2021-29825|2024-09-16T19:14:36.113Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) could disclose sensitive information when using ADMIN_CMD with LOAD or BACKUP. IBM X-Force ID: 204470.

item.title: CVE-2017-1439|2024-09-16T22:15:16.550Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows 9.7, 10,1, 10.5, and 11.1 (includes DB2 Connect Server) could allow a local user with DB2 instance owner privileges to obtain root access. IBM X-Force ID: 128058.

item.title: CVE-2022-35637|2024-09-16T19:40:50.184Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service after entering a malformed SQL statement into the Db2expln tool. IBM X-Force ID: 230823.

item.title: CVE-2018-1451|2024-09-16T19:10:42.084Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 contains a vulnerability that could allow a local user to overwrite arbitrary files owned by the DB2 instance owner. IBM X-Force ID: 140046.

item.title: CVE-2018-1710|2024-09-16T20:27:34.137Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 tool db2licm is affected by buffer overflow vulnerability that can potentially result in arbitrary code execution. IBM X-Force ID: 146364.

item.title: CVE-2021-29763|2024-09-16T20:36:26.858Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1 and 11.5 under very specific conditions, could allow a local user to keep running a procedure that could cause the system to run out of memory.and cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 202267.

item.title: CVE-2018-1802|2024-09-16T20:36:17.290Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 binaries load shared libraries from an untrusted path potentially giving low privilege user full access to the DB2 instance account by loading a malicious shared library. IBM X-Force ID: 149640.

item.title: CVE-2018-1459|2024-09-16T22:25:30.196Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 is vulnerable to stack based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking which could lead an attacker to execute arbitrary code. IBM X-Force ID: 140210.

item.title: CVE-2018-1426|2024-09-16T21:04:29.258Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM GSKit (IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1) duplicates the PRNG state across fork() system calls when multiple ICC instances are loaded which could result in duplicate Session IDs and a risk of duplicate key material. IBM X-Force ID: 139071.

item.title: CVE-2018-1780|2024-09-16T19:14:14.812Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 could allow a local db2 instance owner to obtain root access by exploiting a symbolic link attack to read/write/corrupt a file that they originally did not have permission to access. IBM X-Force ID: 148803.

item.title: CVE-2018-1897|2024-09-16T22:56:05.570Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows 9.7, 10.1, 10.5., and 11.1 db2pdcfg is vulnerable to a stack based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code. IBM X-Force ID: 152462.

item.title: CVE-2019-4057|2024-09-16T18:09:24.227Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 could allow malicious user with access to the DB2 instance account to leverage a fenced execution process to execute arbitrary code as root. IBM X-Force ID: 156567.

item.title: CVE-2021-39002|2024-09-16T20:13:31.618Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2019-4101|2024-09-16T18:13:44.028Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 is vulnerable to a denial of service. Users that have both EXECUTE on PD_GET_DIAG_HIST and access to the diagnostic directory on the DB2 server can cause the instance to crash. IBM X-Force ID: 158091.

item.title: CVE-2017-1434|2024-09-16T18:03:53.908Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows 11.1 (includes DB2 Connect Server) under unusual circumstances, could expose highly sensitive information in the error log to a local user.

item.title: CVE-2020-5025|2024-09-16T20:52:16.858Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 db2fm is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking which could allow a local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 193661.

item.title: CVE-2020-4701|2024-09-16T22:10:34.278Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking which could allow a local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges.

item.title: CVE-2018-1857|2024-09-16T22:14:52.754Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 11.1 could allow a user to bypass FGAC control and gain access to data they shouldn't be able to see. IBM X-Force ID: 151155.

item.title: CVE-2021-38926|2024-09-16T21:03:40.274Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 could allow a local user to gain privileges due to allowing modification of columns of existing tasks. IBM X-Force ID: 210321.

item.title: CVE-2021-29703|2024-09-16T19:04:49.053Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) is vulnerable to a denial of service as the server terminates abnormally when executing a specially crafted SELECT statement. IBM X-Force ID: 200659.

item.title: CVE-2021-29777|2024-09-16T20:58:36.206Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5, under specific circumstance of a table being dropped while being accessed in another session, could allow an authenticated user to cause a denial of srevice IBM X-Force ID: 203031.

item.title: CVE-2017-1451|2024-09-16T22:46:02.718Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows 9.7, 10,1, 10.5, and 11.1 (includes DB2 Connect Server) could allow a local user with DB2 instance owner privileges to obtain root access. IBM X-Force ID: 128178.

item.title: CVE-2018-1428|2024-09-16T17:18:52.141Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM GSKit (IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1) uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 139073.

item.title: CVE-2020-5024|2024-09-16T22:40:07.903Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 could allow an unauthenticated attacker to cause a denial of service due a hang in the SSL handshake response. IBM X-Force ID: 193660.

item.title: CVE-2018-1515|2024-09-16T18:59:35.214Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 10.5 and 11.1, under specific or unusual conditions, could allow a local user to overflow a buffer which may result in a privilege escalation to the DB2 instance owner. IBM X-Force ID: 141624.

item.title: CVE-2023-40692|2024-09-16T18:41:42.612Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service under extreme stress conditions. IBM X-Force ID: 264807.

item.title: CVE-2021-29678|2024-09-16T17:33:35.953Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 could allow a user with DBADM authority to access other databases and read or modify files. IBM X-Force ID: 199914.

item.title: CVE-2018-1449|2024-09-16T19:24:42.398Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 contains a vulnerability that could allow a local user to overwrite arbitrary files owned by the DB2 instance owner. IBM X-Force ID: 140044.

item.title: CVE-2020-4976|2024-09-16T19:20:36.208Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 could allow a local user to read and write specific files due to weak file permissions. IBM X-Force ID: 192469.

item.title: CVE-2022-22389|2024-09-16T17:18:40.685Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service as the server may terminate abnormally when executing specially crafted SQL statements by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 2219740.

item.title: CVE-2023-38727|2024-09-16T18:39:25.963Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted SQL statement. IBM X-Force ID: 262257.

item.title: CVE-2022-22390|2024-09-16T16:43:54.489Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 may be vulnerable to an information disclosure caused by improper privilege management when table function is used. IBM X-Force ID: 221973.

item.title: CVE-2017-1520|2024-09-16T17:37:46.801Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 9.7, 10,1, 10.5, and 11.1 is vulnerable to an unauthorized command that allows the database to be activated when authentication type is CLIENT. IBM X-Force ID: 129830.

item.title: CVE-2022-22483|2024-09-16T17:04:06.830Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to an information disclosure in some scenarios due to unauthorized access caused by improper privilege management when CREATE OR REPLACE command is used. IBM X-Force ID: 225979.

item.title: CVE-2018-1978|2024-09-16T20:11:48.872Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 9.7, 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, which could allow an authenticated local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system as root. IBM X-ForceID: 154069.

item.title: CVE-2023-29267|2024-08-28T15:02:43.378Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5is vulnerable to a denial of service, under specific configurations, as the server may crash when using a specially crafted SQL statement by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 287612.

item.title: CVE-2024-35136|2024-08-15T15:11:35.304Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) federated server 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query under certain conditions. IBM X-Force ID: 291307.

item.title: CVE-2024-35152|2024-08-14T17:58:00.335Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 could allow an authenticated user to cause a denial of service with a specially crafted query due to improper memory allocation. IBM X-Force ID: 292639.

item.title: CVE-2023-52296|2024-08-02T22:55:41.095Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service when querying a specific UDF built-in function concurrently. IBM X-Force ID: 278547.

item.title: CVE-2024-28762|2024-08-02T00:56:58.142Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query under certain conditions. IBM X-Force ID: 285246.

item.title: CVE-2024-27254|2024-08-02T00:28:00.317Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 federated server is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query under certain conditions. IBM X-Force ID: 283813.

item.title: CVE-2024-25030|2024-07-12T21:01:45.842Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1 stores potentially sensitive information in log files that could be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 281677.

item.title: CVE-2023-38729|2024-07-12T21:01:13.640Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server)10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to sensitive information disclosure when using ADMIN_CMD with IMPORT or EXPORT. IBM X-Force ID: 262259.

item.title: CVE-2024-25046|2024-07-12T21:13:55.294Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1 and 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service by an authenticated user using a specially crafted query. IBM X-Force ID: 282953.

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5is vulnerable to a denial of service, under specific configurations, as the server may crash when using a specially crafted SQL statement by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 287612.

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query under certain conditions. IBM X-Force ID: 285246.

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1 and 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service by an authenticated user using a specially crafted query. IBM X-Force ID: 282953.

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1 stores potentially sensitive information in log files that could be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 281677.

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 federated server is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query under certain conditions. IBM X-Force ID: 283813.

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service with a specially crafted query on certain columnar tables. IBM X-Force ID: 280905.

item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service when querying a specific UDF built-in function concurrently. IBM X-Force ID: 278547.

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service as the server may crash when using a specially crafted query on certain columnar tables by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 287613.

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server)10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to sensitive information disclosure when using ADMIN_CMD with IMPORT or EXPORT. IBM X-Force ID: 262259.

item.title: CVE-2024-37529|2024-08-14T17:44:03.110Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1 and 11.5 could allow an authenticated user to cause a denial of service with a specially crafted query due to improper memory allocation. IBM X-Force ID: 294295.

item.title: CVE-2024-35136|2024-08-14T17:47:56.967Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) federated server 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query under certain conditions. IBM X-Force ID: 291307.

item.title: CVE-2024-35152|2024-08-14T17:40:25.318Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 could allow an authenticated user to cause a denial of service with a specially crafted query due to improper memory allocation. IBM X-Force ID: 292639.

item.title: CVE-2024-31882|2024-08-14T17:46:48.338Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1 and 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service, under specific configurations, as the server may crash when using a specially crafted SQL statement by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 287614.

item.title: CVE-2024-37529|2024-08-15T13:30:23.243Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1 and 11.5 could allow an authenticated user to cause a denial of service with a specially crafted query due to improper memory allocation. IBM X-Force ID: 294295.

item.title: CVE-2024-31882|2024-08-16T17:28:04.977Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1 and 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service, under specific configurations, as the server may crash when using a specially crafted SQL statement by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 287614.
